commits.message: [#573] Add Neighborhood Methods          * this adds reduceOnEdges and reduceOnNeighbors methods to LogicalGraph being able to perform custom aggreagtion logic on incident edges / adjacent vertices and returning an updated LogicalGraph     * fixes #573
[#627] Update VertexFusion          * fixes #627

[#635] Bugfix GradoopIdList equals          * made GradoopIdList.equals behave like List.equals     * adjusted test to check list properties     * fixed misuse of equals in test utils     * fixed misuse of equals in hbase test utils     * fixes #635
[#640] added ignore annotation to unused long running tests          * fixes #640
[#642] Implement Label-specific grouping          * added label specific grouping.     * added label specific aggregators.     * fixes #642
[#615] update license to Apache License 2.0          * added new apache 2.0 license header     * added maven:license plugin     * fixes #615
[#643] Re-enabling build fail on checkstyle violation          * Checkstyle 2.16 needs explicit configuration to fail on violations     * let travis check for checkstyle violations     * fixes #643

[#613] Updated config file to be loaded from JSON string          * Changed config: nouns, cities etc. are now being loaded from resources     * Now throws an error when user specified a higher amount of companies/holdings than available     * Fixed bug that the nouns, cities etc. were not loaded from the resource location inside the jar     * Fixes #613
[#633] Throw unchecked exception if binary representation of a property value is too large          * fixes #633

[#651] Render all Graphtransactions in Graphviz          DotDatasink wrote incorrect dotfiles:     - node/edge properties were written as graphviz properties (typically with no visual effect),     - vertices in multiple subgraphs were rendered only in the first subgraph     - individual GraphTransactions were not visible     - properties of graphheads, vertices, edges were not visible     - fixes #651
[#634] Update TLF (#649)          * moved all constants into single class     * Changed start and end tag     * removed intermediate TLF graph     * added support for label with spaces

[#646] Add Drill-up operation          Drill-up is a convenience function for graph transformation that applies a UDF on a specific property and stores the old value. The previous property value is kept stored at the modified vertex / edge. Drill-up can be used as a pre-processor for structural aggregation via Graph Grouping.          * fixes #646

[#658] Decouple graph representation from Graph and Collection          * extract graph / collection operations to interfaces     * introduced factories for LogicalGraph and GraphCollection     * de-coupled graph layout and  graph operations     * removed GraphTransactions     * added factories for graph layouts     * added GVELayout and TxCollectionLayout     * fixes #658

[#524] Update Flink and HBase to 1.3.1          * added flink-hadoop and hbase-hadoop compatibility dependencies     * updated GradoopFlinkTestBase     * removed FlinkHBaseTestBase     * added TestSuite for gradoop-hbase tests     * added Ignore annotation to GraphStatisticsHDFSReaderTest     * fixes #524
[#533] Add IndexedGVELayout          * provides access to label-partitioned data sets     * required for performance optimizations in Cypher engine     * fixes #533
[#636] Remove redundant classes (#664)          * fixes #636
[#666] Escape all html4 entities in DOT labels          * fixes #666
[#665] Fix LabelGroup mixup          * fixes #665
[#647] Add drill down operator          * fixes #647
[#676] Fix typo in SNA Benchmark/Example          * fixes #676

[#671] Push label predicates down to layout          * if a vertex/edge has a label predicate, the corresponding graph layout method will be called instead of loading all vertices/edges and applying a filter transformation     * ff used in combination with IndexedGVELayout, this avoids duplicating objects in a Flink dataflow caused by the filter transformation     * fixes #671
[#673] Add convenience method for Cypher matching          * fixes #673
[#668] Add Indexed CSV data source          * adds a CSV-based datasource that reads vertex/edge files partitioned by label     * fixes #668
[#679] Add null checks around property access          * added @Nullable annotation to Element.getProperties to give compiler warnings     * fixes #679
[#685] Cache maven repos and skip install step          * fixes #685
[#680] Change filter condition in Limit to InAnyGraph          * fixes #680
[docs] Update readme          * added link to Flink Forward presentation
[#687] Fix containment computation of binary methods on derived graphs          * Exclusion and Overlap now use join to compute the resulting vertices / edges     * fixes #687

[#689] Add Gelly Page Rank and generalize Gelly algorithm handling          * Remove type argument from gradoop to gelly mapper interfaces.          Type arguments are not valid here, because flink fails to detect the     actual types.     Interfaces will be replaced with 2 interfaces and 4 implementations:     - a common super interface for each vertices and edges     - an implementation mapping to NullValue     - an implementation mapping to PropertyValue          * Add missing implementations of gradoop to gelly mapper interfaces.     * Implement PageRank from Gelly + Checkstyle formatting     * Fixes #689
[checkstyle] Add suppression for IllegalCatch in PageRank
[#694] Update GDL dependency          * removes repository configuration from pom     * fixes #694

[#703] Add basic graph construction via pattern          [#703] Add basic graph construction via pattern          filter embeddings by return pattern variables          debug outputs          implement add embedding functions based on a return pattern          bugfix(embedding): add got accidentally called twice in map function          remove debug outputs and enable outer right join in post processing          implement label mapping for epgm elements that were created for the return pattern          code cleanup          clean code and write documentation          refactor(CypherPatternMatching): label mapping contains newly created edges + vertices only          fix(tests): avoid nullpointer exception by initializing empty map          reformat code          add missing documentation
[#703] Refactor graph construction code and update docs          * simplified code in CypherPatternMatching     * moved helper parts to QueryHandler
Merge pull request #715 from dbs-leipzig/graph_construction_poc          [#703] Add basic graph construction via pattern
[#681] Reenable set nature of GradoopIdList          * fixes #681
[#720] In ApplySubgraph: ignore vertices that are not part of the subgraph          * fixes #720

#722 reintegrated checkstyle-plugin  (#724)          [#722] reintegrated checkstyle-plugin     - added checkstyle plugin to gradoop-hbase and gradoop-common     - fixed typos and checkstyle errors     - force travis to install all artifacts so checkstyle gets run
[#729] Add wrapper for HITS algorithm          * fixes #729
[#725] Prevent iterating over potentially large collections in GradoopIdSet          * fixes #725
[#728] Update license header to 2018          * fixes #728
[ #731] Add wrapper for SingleSourceShortestPaths algorithm          * fixes #731
[#736] Replace mongo driver dependency with just bson          * fixes #736
[#655] Set up deployment to maven central          * fixes #655
Update README.md

[#650] Adapt Foodbroker to graph transaction layout          * fixes #650
[#746] Fix deployment of parent artifact          * fixes #746
[#748] Update version to 0.3.3-SNAPSHOT          * fixes #748
[#750] Add sonatype snapshot repository to readme information          * fixes #750

[#752] Add minor changes to Gradoop examples          * Directory loading instead of explicit file loading in JSON Example     * Update communities examples     * Add method for DOT to PNG conversion using a system process calling `dot`     * fixes #752

[#744] Implement ApplyTransformation on Tx Collection Layout          * Move ApplyAggregation tests into own test class     * Automatically run ApplyAggregationTest on GVE and Tx Layout     * Automatically run ApplyTransformationTest on GVE and Tx Layout     * Enforce implementation for execution on GVE and Tx layout in Apply     * Implement ApplyTransformation for Transaction Layout     * Fixes #744

[#769] Fix randomly failing Foodbroker tests          * adds a test-specific FoodBroker config to fix random failure of FoodBrokerTest     * fixes some spelling mistakes, obsolete "throws..." and diamond contents

[#766] Add JaccardIndex Algorithm (#767)          * configurable JaccardIndex          * running version of JaccardIndex          * Functions and package-info          * refactoring          * added denominator configuration          * documentation and reformatting of tests          * undirected test          * refactoring and documentation of functions          * refactoring according to checkstyle          * reverted accidental change in ExpandEmbeddingsNode          * requested changes from pr: documentation, naming and use of edge factory          * fixed checkstyle line length on link error
Revert "[#766] Add JaccardIndex Algorithm (#767)"          This reverts commit 445a07c90682a7d9dff2aac420d44302d49d7c76.
Merge pull request #785 from dbs-leipzig/revert-767-ConfigurableJaccardIndex          Revert "[#766] Add JaccardIndex Algorithm"

[#737] Add apache accumulo store and test case (#759)          * add accumulo store implements and test unit          * update readme, rename confusing class name          * fix spelling mistake of test suite name
Fix GDL syntax error in OverlapTest
Add a test case for two graphs with only their vertex set overlapping.     (Edge sets are disjoint.)
Reimplement overlap by getting the intersection of vertex and edge sets
Merge pull request #787 from p-f/786-overlap-fix          Fix overlap operator for two graphs overlapping by vertex set only.
